alert.note: Alert for Carson; Gray; Hutchinson; Moore; Potter; Roberts (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued May 16 at 10:45PM CDT until May 16 at 11:45PM CDT by NWS Amarillo
info.description: The National Weather Service in Amarillo has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Carson County in the Panhandle of Texas... Southern Hutchinson County in the Panhandle of Texas... Western Gray County in the Panhandle of Texas... Eastern Potter County in the Panhandle of Texas... Southwestern Roberts County in the Panhandle of Texas... Southeastern Moore County in the Panhandle of Texas... * Until 1145 PM CDT. * At 1044 PM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from 3 miles southwest of Borger to 11 miles south of Fritch to 9 miles north of Washburn, moving east at 35 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor damage to roofs, siding, and trees is possible. * Locations impacted include... Amarillo, Pampa, Borger, Panhandle, Fritch, White Deer, Groom, Skellytown, Sanford, Kingsmill, Lake Meredith and Pantex. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.

area.areaDesc: Carson; Gray; Hutchinson; Moore; Potter; Roberts
